Subject: Re: Decepticons hit an run.

All Beasbox could see was the looming shadow of the tank about to him him,
he fire up as many times as he could, but the shadow grew very large over
top of him. He tried to leap out of the way, but the huge tank landed right
on top of him. A sickening thud resounded all around. (He isnt totally
flat, so Firearm will be sort of on a small bump)
